lines.name: Maria
lines.text: How does this game work? Just press Next?

lines.name: Leona
lines.text: That's a good start. This game enables you to chat with an AI as it creates an ongoing conversation, like an on-the-fly screenwriter. Press Next.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: I see an "I'm noticing AI generation" button, when should I press that?

lines.name: Leona
lines.text: Even though it appears, you shouldn't press it right away. Wait until you've read a good amount of the conversation before pressing it. For now, press "Next".

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: I'm also seeing Instructions at the bottom.

lines.name: Leona
lines.text: True, they change with the game, so look there when you're confused.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Now let's press "I'm noticing AI generation"!!!

lines.name: Leona
lines.text: Use the checkboxes to the right to guess which line was generated by AI. This round, your choice doesn't matter. Click "Submit" to finish.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Great, you're done with this part. If you want more info, come back when you complete the other conversations.

lines.name: Leona
lines.text: Now it gets really interesting. We want you to see how the AI works.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Now, Leona and I will briefly try to discuss a random topic about Art.

lines.name: Leona
lines.text: Ok, that's it, the tutorial is over. Press Next.

lines.name: Maria
lines.text: Choose a different message thread and enjoy the other conversations! You don't have to do this tutorial next time unless you want to.
